data.title: Eddie Onboard Computer - On-Board Computer
data.meta_description:
Spacemanic's Eddie - the On-board Computer - is a CubeSat OBC module suitable for nano-satellite C&DH, TT&C, mass storage, and ADCS.

Eddie is made from...
data.text:
Spacemanic's Eddie - the On-board Computer - is a CubeSat OBC module suitable for nano-satellite C&DH, TT&C, mass storage, and ADCS.

Eddie is made from components with extensive flight heritage on several space missions and complies with selected ECSS norms.

The system is compatible with a variety of commercial Real-Time Operating Systems and is provided running a FreeRTOS-based OS and a variety of software drivers.

Eddie is a plug-and-play computer designed to enable communication with other components and sensors with just a few command lines of code.
